sentences.en: In accounting, cash means all items that are acceptable for de - posit in a bank.

sentences.en: Look for a posit as a compute programs with a mediums firm.

sentences.en: Most religions posit the existence of life after death.
sentences.cn: 大多数宗教都假定人死后生命仍存在。

sentences.en: Obvious examples are potentiometers and tachogenerators to monitor the posit ion and speed of a shaft.
sentences.cn: 反映转轴位置和速度的电位器与测速发电机是我们最熟悉的传感器的例子.

sentences.en: Other historians posit that she died of old age around 550 BC.
sentences.cn: 别的史学家则认为诗人一直活到公元前550年左右才寿终正寝.

sentences.en: Results The ESBLs posit ive rate of klebsiella pneumoniae was 29.8 %.
sentences.cn: 结果肺炎克雷伯菌产ESBLs阳性率为29.8%.

sentences.en: Several writers have posited the idea of a universal consciousness.
sentences.cn: 几个作者都假设一种普遍意识的思想。

sentences.en: The tracking precision is got by measuring the far - field facula posit.
sentences.cn: 通过测量回馈光远场光斑的位置变化可以得到端机的跟瞄精度.
